DOC.brief_summary: The objective study obtain female first-catch urine , vaginal , cervical endocervical swab male first-catch urine urethral swab test multiple APTIMA Assays Gen-Probe PANTHER® System
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Collection Female Male Specimens PANTHER® System Testing
DOC.criteria: The subject least 16 year age time enrollment currently sexually active ( intercourse within past 12 month ) The subject and/or legally authorize representative willing undergo inform consent process prior study participation ( minor need document consent his/her parent legal guardian , unless site institutional review board ( IRB ) approve waiver parental consent minor ) In addition , subject must meet least one follow criterion : The subject report symptoms consistent suspected STI abnormal discharge , genital itching , pain/discomfort sexual intercourse urination , and/or low abdominal discomfort Subject asymptomatic known partner , contact , person confirm suspect STI ( ) Subject asymptomatic undergoing screen evaluation possible STIs Subject ( female ) asymptomatic undergoing routine examination pelvic examination A potential subject ineligible clinical trial enrollment subject , clinician , medical record report follow : The subject take antibiotic medication within last 21 day Subject already participate study Subject history illness principal investigator ( PI ) designee considers could interfere affect conduct , result , and/or completion clinical trial Subject history illness PI designee considers could create unacceptable risk subject enrol
